description.narrative: Resilient, responsive and inclusive governance and service delivery

policy-marker.narrative: Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention on Biological Diversity
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention to Combat Desertification
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation
Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

title.narrative: Improved effectiveness, efficiency and transparency of SDF2 supported Government of Somaliland ministries and agencies

1. Level of institutional knowledge in climate risk management focusing agriculture, fisheries, livestock and water supply sectors as a result of SDF2 investment 2. Number of SDF2 supported MDAs staff that demonstrate improved project design and implementation knowledge as aresult of on the job and in service-training 3. Number of MDAs budgeting and spending on operation and maintenance made in the respective sustainbility plans 4. Number of SDF2 projects executed on time (and on budget with 15% deviation); demonstrating improved planning and implementation

target.value: 1. Develop assessment tool for knowledge on climate change for MDA staff in agriculture. fisheries. livestock and water supply and development of modules for climate risk management 2. Development of SDF2 capacity development note to inform the overall capacity development strategy 3. Government allocating 70% of the funds identified in the approved projects for operation and maintenance in the 2020 fiscal year budget attributed to influence from SDF2 funding 4. Development of 3 costed project work plans and procurement plans for monitoring progress towards achievement of milestones; and completion of of one transition project on time and in budget

actual.value: 1. Climate change knowledge assessment tool developed 2. Capacity development note developed 3. Two transition projects got 70% of the allocation of funding in 2020 fiscal year 4. 3 project proposals developed and given conditional approval by the JSC

target.value: 1. 2.5 rate on climate change 2.20 staff at MDA capacity development 3. Development of 3 detailed sustainability plans froa pproved projects and commitment letters from MoFD 4. 3 projects completed on time and in budget

title.narrative: Improved availability of clean water and improved road infrastructure and services in urban and rural areas to promote inclusive integrated social development

Number of beneficiaries using safe and affordable drinking water for domestic use of an improved water source, disaggregated by gender, age, disability and region/area including: 1) Quantity of water per day available for distribution in urban water systems through SDF support 2) Number of water points connected 3) KMs of roads maintained / rehabilitated

target.value: 15.520 beneficiaries. completion of HWA Well Field Collector; starting implementation of Borama water supply improvement project; and HWA project proposal developed scoring at least 70% on appraisal. submitted to JSC for approval; aligned with SDF2 impact and outcome to support inclusive economic growth

actual.value: 15.520 achievement arising from HWA Well Field Collector completion

target.value: Completion of drilling of 4 boreholes in Las Dhuure. and Completion of 15 km of pipelaying in Borama
27.000 beneficiaries using safe water and affordable water in Borama within 200m walking distance
Completion of 13km of pipelaying in Las Dhuure. connecting to NGPS and associated electromechanical works.
120.000 beneficiaries using safe water and affordable water in Hargeisa and Las Anod within 200m walking distance

title.narrative: Service delivery and governance improved as a result of rehabilitated infrastructure that is operational and maintained

1. Percentage-/number of the population benefitting from SDF 2 investments including time to water points and cost to consumers 2. Number of SDF 2 supported Ministries Department Agencies (MDAs) using improved public resource management instruments in planning, budgeting and monitoring according to improved tools and national guidelines.

target.value: 18.4% of citizens reporting improved income attributable to SDF and 305 jobs created.
